name: Kitchen Assembly
summary:
* THIS IS A DEMO. FULL ACCESS €14.99 *

This hands-on VR lesson lets the student assemble and install a real kitchen from start to finish. The process consists of 50 steps, divided into multiple stages. The student is able to make use of necessary tools for each step, to consult the instructions tablet, and to ask for hints when not sure what to do next. For repeat processes, the student is aided by an invisible assistant. 

Student will learn about: necessary tools, materials and steps required to...
